permissions: Admins can delete production incidents. Non-admins can delete if authorized for the incident subject under the same rules as create (IncidentPolicy#create?).
side_effects: Deletes the production incident, dependent incident records (incident unit-of-measure quantities, root causes, action items, participants, incident tag incidents), and related incident assignment notifications; child incidents are disassociated (parent_id cleared).
validation_notes: Requires a production incident ID argument and --confirm to proceed.
